title: Erasing any trace of a web site that was Googled, searched on Firefox or Chrome
content: I regularly use Google, Firefox or Chrome, to search for a site, go to site. I want, on my IMac, to erase any trace of my search, anything associated with this site. Thank you
creator: teacup63

title: support with webpage difficulty
content:
When I go on eBay the first website page is fine. However when I click on a link to a product I get weird web pages with a heading "breadcrumb" and the page comes out with only a few images and this strange lot of directional arrows. When I paste the webpage address into another webpage exactly the same problem. When I paste the address into Chrome, no problem, the page comes up correctly with all the images and not this weird page I get with Firefox. I prefer to use Firefox and I would really rather not have to change to Chrome or MS Edge.

I didn't always have this problem, it seemed to have been more recently and seems to be only with eBay. I imagine it's something in the settings that somehow switched and I need to switch it back.

Thank you for all those at Mozilla support, I look forward to a reply. My email address is alesich@optusnet.com.au regards, Bert
creator: alesich

title: blocked by remote-settings.mozilla.org in firefox on windows 11
content: The title says it all - I try to browse to a website in my bookmarks list and I get blocked!!! I'm on my ubuntu machine, as I can't do this on my Windows 11 machine!!!
creator: AllThtUR

title: Clicking either a checkbox or option button fails to set the fill color on every website
content: Across multiple websites (even this one, clicking either a checkbox or option button fails to set the fill color, however the clicked element is selected. The color setting is "use system colors"system, vers 130.0.1. Problem continues in troubleshoot mode. Whassup?
creator: JoshuaR

title: Não consigo baixar o firefox no site dele mesmo. Todos os navegadores dizem que não é uma conexão segura, isso aconteceu em 3 computadores diferentes.
content: Tentei baixar o mozzilla firefox para windows 10 64 bits em 3 computadores diferentes. Todos os navegadores responderam que não era uma conexão segura.
creator: ritacamposgm
